page.title: 15EVERYDAY LIFE 2 (Town)
page.content: We live around the back of the town centre. After school we sometimes go into the town to play with our friends. Then we might go over to the shop and buy some sweets. Over there everybody has a B.M.X bike. Sometimes the town gets so hot and on Fridays and Saturdays it gets so crowded, that we go for bike rides into the countryside. We like the country because there is hardly any noise.In the town there is lots of pollution because of the lorries. We live on the outskirts.There are absolutely no facilities where we live no shops or anything and the roads are pretty poor. At weekends we tend to go elsewhere. Otherwise we just play in each others gardens or roller skate around the pavements. Sometimes we go into the fields and climb trees, or go birdwatching. {(Mixed Group A)
